target.message: Fix linting errors caught by PyFlakes

Merged in ericr86/segway/no-single-mixutre-split (pull request #97)

Prevent a single gaussian mixture from splitting

Approved-by: Michael Hoffman <michael.hoffman@utoronto.ca>

Merged in ericr86/segway/temporary-observation-files (pull request #90)

Fix observation files being temporarly and securely created in segway task

Approved-by: Michael Hoffman <michael.hoffman@utoronto.ca>
Update test touchstones to reflect training without observation lists
Remove TODO. Remove binary distribution from setup configuration.
Update documentation with instructions on virtual evidence
Update version number for next release

Revised installation script with the following changes:
  Fixed bug that allowed spaces in paths.
  Installed HDF5 version 1.8.2->1.8.4
  Explicit PyTables installer (rather than just using setup.py 'requires')
    to make sure it is installed **before** the program of interest.
    This will be more important once we upgrade to PyTables 2.2, since
    that version has dependencies that aren't listed in its setup.py,
    and thus must be managed separately (Cython, numexpr, numpy).
  Changed check_version() interface.
  Updated the way versions are extracted from URLs, to allow hyphens in the
    version number (rather than in the program name, as was previously the case)

Fixed install.tmpl to actually use PKG_VERSION
line_start, line_end need to be converted to int before comparison

Merged in minibatch-training (pull request #37)

Minibatch training
fixed a duplication typo in documentation

Merged in ericr86/segway (pull request #71)

Fix "bad interprter: Text file busy" error from submitted jobs

Approved-by: Michael Hoffman
Update NEWS with numpy array casting fix
Remove code conflicting with the Sphinx build and command line help files.
Fix quick start documentation step numbering
Update version to 1.3.4 to cooperate with pypi
Update sphinx HTML math image extension to be compatible with versions > 1.8
Fixed error in easy-installation that caused drmaa easy-install to fail.
global sharing of mem usage stats
global sharing of mem usage stats
Improved segway install location prompt and remade install.py
